---
title: "Usage Examples"
---

## Standardize Filenames
```python
from FileJanitor import standardize_filename

# Example: Clean up a messy filename
result = standardize_filename("My Document (1).pdf", case="lower")
print(result)
```

## Flatten Directory Structure
```python
from FileJanitor import flatten

# Example: Flatten nested directories
flatten("/path/to/nested/folders", "/path/to/output")
```

## Replace Patterns in Filenames
```python
from FileJanitor import replace_pattern

# Example: Replace spaces with underscores
replace_pattern("/path/to/files", " ", "_")
```

## Index Files
```python
from FileJanitor import index_files

# Example: Create a file index
index_files("/path/to/directory")
```
